pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, May 19, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Friday, May 19, 2017:

Surrey, British Columbia

9:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit with families at the Don Christian Recreation Centre to highlight the Canada Child Benefit. A media availability will follow.

Don Christian Recreation Centre
6220 - 184 Street
Surrey, British Columbia

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity for visit
  • Open coverage for media availability
  • Media should arrive no later than 9:00 a.m.

11:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with members of the Filipino community in Surrey.

Kubyertos Lechon House Restaurant
8140 - 120 Street, Unit 106
Surrey, British Columbia

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should arrive no later than 10:30 a.m.


Abbotsford, British Columbia

1:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit the Gur Sikh Temple and will deliver remarks.

Gur Sikh Temple         
33094 South Fraser Way
Abbotsford, British Columbia

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage of remarks
  • Media should arrive no later than 12:45 p.m.


Note: all times local
